text:
Subject: Urgent: Project Alpha Report

A reminder that the final report for Project Alpha is due this Friday, September 19th, by 5 PM.

Subject: Login Help

I can't seem to log into the portal. Can you help me with this?

Subject: FYI: Office Maintenance

Please be aware of the planned maintenance this weekend. No action is required on your part.

Subject: Quick question about the slides

Hey, can you send me the marketing slides? Need them by tomorrow afternoon. Thanks!
Can you let me know what time the team meeting is?
The project proposal needs to be on my desk by next Tuesday evening.
Just a heads-up, the client's launch is on Sept 25th. Our internal prep meeting is on the 22nd.
Weekly sales report is now available for viewing in the dashboard.
Hi, I had a question about the budget for Q4. Can we set up a time to chat?
Please remember to submit your expense reports from the conference. The final cutoff is 09/30/2025.
We need to be mindful of the upcoming project deadlines this quarter.
Can you please have the server rebooted in 3 hours?
Did we ever get a final date for the project kickoff?
The new security policy will take effect on October 1st. Please review the attached PDF.
I'm running late, can we push our 10am call to 10:30am today?
Thanks for sending that over, I'll take a look.
Where can I find the documentation for the new API?
Your subscription is expiring soon. Please update your payment information.
The Q3 performance review is due EOD.
What are the next steps for the Omega project?
Could you please approve my vacation request for next month?
All hands meeting is on the calendar for 11/5/2025.
Just confirming I've received the files. Thanks!
Please prepare the presentation for the client meeting next week.
How do I reset my password?
Reminder: your quarterly goals must be finalized by the end of this month.
Invoice #1234 from Acme Corp is attached.
Is the project still on track for the original go-live date?
Please provide your feedback on the design mockups by Thursday.
Happy birthday!
Just wanted to check in and see how things are going.
I was wondering about the status of my ticket #789.
Your Amazon order #123-456789 has shipped.
I'm having trouble with the software installation, any advice?
The team lunch has been canceled.
The documents for the merger need to be signed by noon tomorrow.
Could you explain the discrepancy in the latest sales figures?
Our new office address is 123 Main St. Please update your records.
